extendedInfo.description: *********************************** Just One Day*** Free for a limited time*** ********************************The best restaurant simulation.Have you ever thought of owning a fast food restaurant? Here you will experience operating a fast-food restaurants completely of your own, challenge your reaction and speed to meet the different requirements of different customers and food which includes dozens of different burgers, beverages, fries and ice cream and more. At the beginning of each food preparation you will be given a few seconds to prepare the food, then customers will continuously come in and the speed will become faster and faster. Customers have four expressions, very happy, normal mood, unhappy and angry. If the speed of food preparation is slow then customers will feel terrible, the biggest secret to make money depends on efficiency service and customer satisfaction, prepare food faster will generate higher revenue and also tips. You can use to the revenue to upgrade a variety of items and buy new products. Constant surprises, challenge faster speed of food preparation. Preparation of three layers Hamburger to eight layers burgers and drinks as well as french fries and other foods to the customers. From simple to complex, infinite happiness, compete with friends to see who has the highest score faster and speed of reactions . A wide range of scenes, challenging and cute game to see who can perfectly earn their customers money into their own pockets, what are you waiting for, come join in the challenge.Constant surprises, so what are you waiting for, come join the fast-food production business and enjoy the fun!Challenge the Hamburger making, test your speed and passion to see who is the final big winner! !Surprise! Why not challenge the speed limit! Surprises waiting for you to discover! !

reviews.title: Pls update
reviews.comment: I so love this game! Pls fix the force close issue and the ad issue!! And it would be perfect if we can save our previous game levels! Just sayin\'! And the orders too! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love cooking
reviews.comment: Love you love you love you love you love you!!!!!!\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Far too long to upgrade
reviews.comment: Takes too long to upgrade and it does not give u all of Ur inventory space it says y have some times I have 8 trays and then 7. Ice cream freezes lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: The game gets boring because the orders are the same. It also gets boring because it takes FOREVER to get to the next level...OMG change this please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s alright but...
reviews.comment: The game gets really annoying... I can\'t even figure out how to use the trays in time before the costumers get al pissy. Need to make it easier and be able to make multiple burger meals please!
reviews.author: morgan ney

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: HAVE U PEOPLE NEVER HEARD OF SAVE OPTION? Other than tht its a fun and addicting game. :)

reviews.comment: Its fun,every time I play thos game,it makes me hungry

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: Keeps freezing and then I have to start from day one! Please fix!
reviews.author: Betty Anderson

reviews.title: Addictive and then...
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed this game, but I accumulated way more money than I had items to spend it on. The ads were intrusive too, at least not popping during game play, but right before and/or after.
reviews.author: Tacy Plush

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: But easy I wish it was a lil harder but its a cool game :-)

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Fries now work!If I could give 10 stars,I would!Its the best I\'ve played!Thank you!

reviews.title: Hamberger game
reviews.comment: It was fun being able to play it and when I first played I thought I was working at a resurant.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really fun and addictive game. Nice job red infinity. =)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game but a few bugs
reviews.comment: The game is good but it takes far too long to level up. I\'ve played for about 170 games and only at level 12!   Also there\'s a bug where the ice cream machine stops working and only starts again when you serve someone ice cream. What this means is that If someone orders ice cream which you don\'t have, you will never be e able to serve them and this is incredibly frustrating. There\'s also another bug with inventory space not able to be fully used.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why, ,?
reviews.comment: I have play this game untill level 11-12. Suddenly my phone on off themself, after the phone on back, my level going back to level 1. Y ? I play this game ,sometime this game will hang,no run anymore ,if the game not running ,the phone will on off automatically ,can i know y?  I need using samsung galaxy s 3. I like the game so much.  Plz help my problem. Thank you

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: its awesome, it has real sound affects, its so addicting!!!!!

reviews.title: Fun

reviews.title: Fun but some issues
reviews.comment: The game is very nice and fun to play. However, no 5 stars for now. It freezes and forces stop now and again. Other thing is that it keeps channeling me to Google play page every time I play. 3 stars until they fix the problems
